So,
I've played this game for about 3 years and actually, I recommend it, but if you want have nice game experience you should definitely buy prime account or operation pass. Why? Because since CSGO is "Free to play" on non prime almost everybody is cheating on competitive matchmaking. If you want to try CSGO, you can also play some community servers with anticheat or admins so there is lower chance to get cheaters in game. So yeah it's nice game but as I said, non prime matchmaking is really crazy.
One of, if not the best competitive esports out there.
